subject: Fwd: [ALERT] Possible error on your New Enquire Form Zap

full_threads.body:
Hey Jillian,

Thanks for reaching out. We’ve received your ticket and our team is now looking into it.

Just a quick note: due to the holiday season, updates may take a little longer than usual.

In the event of an emergency, you may contact us by phone at 1300 072 134.

Rest assured, we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Wishing you a wonderful festive season

FYI

*JILLIAN DINKEL*
CREATIVE DIRECTOR & PRINCIPAL
94 Cathedral Street, Woolloomooloo NSW 2011
P: (02) 8033 5429
*JILLIANDINKEL.COM* <https://www.jilliandinkel.com/>


The content of this email is confidential and intended for the
recipient specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share
any part of this message with any third party, without a written
consent of the sender. If you received this email by mistake, please
reply to notify us, followed by the deletion of this email.
We acknowledge the Gadigal People as the traditional owners
of the land in which we work and pay our respects to their Elders,
past, present and future.

Begin forwarded message:

From: Zapier Alerts <alerts@mail.zapier.com>
Date: 22 December 2025 at 1:28:34 pm AEDT
To: jillian@jilliandinkel.com
Subject: [ALERT] Possible error on your New Enquire Form Zap
Reply-To: alerts@mail.zapier.com

﻿
We've identified 1 error that needs your review.
